unnormalised: Bore, konnen tori lagich tax kaydea bodlanchi mhaiti vicharli, bare? Punn, vostu hamesha bodlot ravtat, punn hanv zanna techer adharit ek thodke विवरण hanv dita. Hanv वकील nhui, स्पष्ट रूपान, dekhun haka योग्य kaydeshir suchovnni mhunn gheunaka, bore? Thoddi khari suchovnni zai asli zalear Adv. Sharma-ak mell.
normalised: Bore, konnen tori lagichea kallar tax kaydea bodlanchi vicharnni keli, bare? Tor, vostu sodanch bodlot ravtat, punn maka zanna asa tachea aadharan ek jhalak ithe asa. Hanv vakil nhui, dekhun spasht panan he yogya kaydesheer updesh mhunn gheunaka, bare? Tuka khorea updeshachi goroz asa zalear Advocate Sharma-ak bhett di.

unnormalised: Pehle, Income Tax Act, 1961-ant zalelya bodlancher laksh divi. Budgettchea vellar te hamesha vostu bodlot ravtat – Feb-Marchchea lagich ghoshnaachi apeksha kari. Tumkam sadharanpan section 80C, 80D vagere khal deductions-an sudharanna distali. Lok hamesha tax kasa bachavo korcho mhunn dukhhi astat, nhui? Tumchea sobean gharant ravon HRA davo korta tenna korta tashem – tem korunk naka, *yaar*.
normalised: Poile vatten, aai-kar kaydea, ek hazar nau she sayesttek satt-icher nazar dovra. Budgetachea vellar te sodanch vostu bodlot ravtat – February te March vellar ghoshnna asunk zata. Samanypanan tuka section atyasi C, atyasi D ityadi khal utar dixtti poddtali. Lok sodanch aai-kar koso sambhallcho mhunnji vichar kortat, nhui mhunn? Ghora tutka aapanchea ghara jevtan mhunn H-R-A daavo korcheach sarikhim - tem kor naka, yaar.

unnormalised: GST ek ani ek mothem. Dar hamesha punerveekshan kartat. Businessank खासpan CBIC kadta tea suchnavancher adharit ravon garjechem asa. Tumkam pattlea vorrsa कपड्यांचे GST दरacher zaleli bhov khasti yad asa? Mothem *halla gulla*! E-invoicing-achi antim date aslise thodi kalji gheun garjechi asa. Pattlea vorrsa ti 5 Cr. turnover-ak denvoileli.
normalised: G-S-T mhunnjer dusri vhoddli vast. Dar sodanch porikshan kartat. Vyaparank khas panan C-B-I-C koddun notifications koddun update zaun ravoonk zai. Pattlea varsak textilancher G-S-T daracher zal'li ghardhool yaad asa tumka? Vhodd halla gulla! e-invoicing-achi cutoff-ui tumi nazar dovrunk zai asli vostu. Tea pattlea varsak ti panj crore turnover meren khala keli.

unnormalised: Direct tax-ache zagde visrunakat. Pending aslelea case-ache nirakaran sarkaar "Vivad Se Vishwas" sarkhya योजना kadta. Sadharanpan tumka mukhel रकम bharuk podta, punn tum interest ani penaliticheacher mafi ghevum yeta. Tuzo koslo tori योजना laggu zata mhunn tpas. Te sadharanpan Jan-ache 1ल्या सप्तकांत gheshi kortat.
normalised: Direct tax vadantui visrunk naka. Sarkar lambit case-o settle korunk “Vivad Se Vishwas” sarkeo yojna sodanch suru korti. Samanypanan tuka mukhya rashi farik korchi poddtta, punn tuka vyaj ani jurmanyacher mafi mellunk xakta. Tuncher heo yojna laagoo zatat ki nhui mhunn check kora. Te sadharan panan Janvarychea poilea hafteant heo yojna ghoshit kartat.

unnormalised: Khub अंतिमपण Income Tax Department website ani GST portal sarkhea सधिकृत स्त्रोतंकdchean sodyeche ताजे mhaiti ghe. Fakt khobrank ani WhatsApp forwards-ancheacher visvas thevnaka, *okay*? Ani ho, CA (Chartered Accountant) vo tax vakilak विचार. Te tumka he junglan utronk palak zatat. Mhaka umed asa hee tumka palak zatali.
normalised: Kheren, Income Tax Department website ani G-S-T portal sarkeo adhikrut utpatti sodanch vapra, tantuntlea tantun nove utpatti mellttat. Khabram-lekhank vo WhatsApp forwards-ancher sodanch aadharit ravoonaka, bare? Ani ho, ek C-A (Chartered Accountant) vo tax lawyer-ak bhett di. Tankam hea zunglak vapronk tuka modot korunk zata. Ummed asa, tuka hi modot korunk zata.
